actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The yeti uses Chilling Gaze and makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Chilling Gaze (Gaze)
actions.desc: One creature within 30 feet that is not immune to cold damage makes a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  the creature takes 10 (3d6) cold damage and is paralyzed for 1 minute. It repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns  ending the effect on a success. If a creatures saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it  it is immune to any Chilling Gaze for 24 hours.

special_abilities.name: Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The yeti has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

special_abilities.name: Fire Fear
special_abilities.desc: When the yeti takes fire damage, it is rattled until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Storm Sight
special_abilities.desc: The yetis vision is not obscured by weather conditions.
